subject: Negotiation
title: The Zone of Possible Agreement
description: A fast breakdown of The Zone of Possible Agreement for builders.

hook.text: Every deal has a hidden overlap where both sides can say yes. Most never find it.

buildup.text: ZOPA is the range between what you'll accept and what they'll accept.

discovery.text: If you'll sell for $80K minimum and they'll pay up to $100K, the ZOPA is $80Kâ€“$100K.

twist.text: When there's no overlap, no amount of charm can close the deal.

climax.text: Skilled negotiators spend more time mapping the ZOPA than making arguments.

punchline.text: Find the overlap first. Everything else is theater.

quiz.question: What is the ZOPA?
options: The range where both sides can agree
The first offer in a negotiation
